body.p: The draft amendments included no examples illustrating the application of the amendments. Respondents to the draft amendments and feedback from subsequent outreach suggested that providing illustrative examples would help entities understand and apply the amendments. In response to this feedback, the Board added two illustrative examples (Examples 4–5). The examples are simple and their aim is limited to helping stakeholders understand how to apply the definition of accounting estimates, rather than aiming to address specific application questions.
